A cozier, more relatable alternative to the Winter Olympics. YOU may be the next great Olympic athlete.

snippet.title: Donovan McNabb: NASCAR drivers aren't athletes
snippet.description:
Donovan McNabb: NASCAR drivers aren't athletes by Jordan Bianchi on Nov 16 2013, 11:51a
Are NASCAR drivers athletes? Donovan McNabb doesn’t think so because all Jimmie Johnson does is “sit in a car and drive.”

snippet.title: Michael Vick not assured to start at quarterback
snippet.description:

Many think Michael Vick will ultimately win the Eagles' starting quarterback job, but it's a legitimate competition and Nick Foles -- not Vick -- may be in the lead.
